msg.msgText:
A "ConnectionPolicy" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create ConnectionPolicy help imaserver create ConnectionPolicy "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create ConnectionPolicy "Name=ConnPol1" "UserID=johndoe"
Configuration items for "ConnectionPolicy" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
